Patient Management
and More

Trial Partners provides a free and intuitive portal system to track inbound referrals, campaign progress, and past results. All data is encrypted t-rest and in-transit to meet HIPAA compliance standards and makes monitoring your campaigns easier than ever before.

Features Include

Manage Patients

Receive real-time notifications whenever a new patient signs-up, update his/her enrollment status, archieve disqualified subjects, and more!

Reporting and Exports

Export patient information to .CSV files for easy transfer to other systems and run customized reports to gauge campaign performance for specific protocols, indications, locations, and more.

Users and Roles

Create and manage team members and assign roles that limit or provide access to portal features based on position in your organization.

CTMS Integration

Integrate your Trial Partners portal with your CTMS provider so that all inbound leads go directly into your external system.
